Package com.hps.wizard

Interface Summary
TaskCallback Callback interface through which the TaskFragment will report the task's progress and results back to the AbstractWizardActivity.
 

Class Summary
AbstractWizardActivity The default Activity for a wizard.
AbstractWizardActivity.ProgressDialogFragment Maintains a static progress dialog so orientation changes don't automatically destroy it when background validation is underway.

R.style  
StateFragment This class acts as the parent class for all states.
StateFragment.StateDefinition The definition of a state, including its class and arguments.
TaskFragment This Fragment manages a single background task and retains itself across configuration changes.
ValidationAsyncTask A task which allows a StateFragment to run validation in the background.
WizardActivity The default Activity for a wizard.
WizardDialog The default Activity for a wizard.
